title: Sunny Top Floor Apartment
posting_body: Bright and spacious 3rd floor unit with front and back balconies to suit your mood.
Watch the hustle and bustle of Belgrade Avenue from atop your front balcony or sit quietly on your back porch among the trees.
Large living room and dining room.
Fun bar area that could also be used as a media center or work space.
Beautiful wood floors have just been refinished.
Washer/dryer hook ups in the kitchen.
Walk to restaurants on Belgrade Ave.
Walk to Roslindale Village and West Roxbury's Centre Street.
Buses right there on Belgrade and short four minute walk to Bellevue Commuter Rail Station.
All of the carpet has been removed.
Some pictures show carpet, but it is no longer there.
